block.p: Re ''This Net Is Built For Play'' (State of the Art, Sept. 28), about Sega's new gaming network, SegaNet: As my youngest son prepares to join the online Sega gaming community, what assurances do I have as a concerned parent that he will be protected from juvenile predators who have been known to seek out victims on the Internet?

Re ''This Net Is Built For Play'' (State of the Art, Sept. 28), about Sega's new gaming network, SegaNet: As my youngest son prepares to join the online Sega gaming community, what assurances do I have as a concerned parent that he will be protected from juvenile predators who have been known to seek out victims on the Internet?

This gaming community seems to be one that should attract countless naive youngsters, themselves only interested in playing games. Unfortunately, unsavory individuals might also be attracted to this community.
